title: Practical Mathematics Competency Enhancement Course Using Asynchronous Learning Networks

context.additional_context: A mathematics vocational training program combining VR simulations and asynchronous discussion activities in a smartphone-based learning environment.

learning_goals: Learners can complete math modeling tasks with over 90% success using weekly VR simulations in asynchronous learning environments
Learners can provide constructive feedback at least twice weekly on discussion boards according to peer evaluation criteria
Learners can submit collaborative project deliverables according to assigned roles (leader/analyst/presenter) and achieve over 80 points

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
